Text:
The best part about this type of film is "what would (you) do??????? this has it all!!!!!!!Best horror/thriller in years! No lies! Beautifully shot, perfectly acted. The end just ok. But, how would you end this masterpiece?????????Huh????
Huh?????
 That's what I thought. Watch this, not now but right now!!!!!!!!!!

 9.9
